name: Shy Guy (green)
desc: A green shy guy that falls off ledges. It will kick shells if it encounters them.

name: Shy Guy (red)
desc: A red shy guy that stays on ledges. It will kick shells if it encounters them.

name: Shy Guy (yellow)
desc: A yellow shy guy that falls off ledges. It will kick shells if it encounters them and turn them into disco shells. It moves faster than the green variant.

name: Shy Guy (blue)
desc: A blue shy guy that stays on ledges. It will kick shells if it encounters them. It moves faster than the red variant.

name: Spear Guy, dances back and forth
desc: A Spear Guy from Yoshi's Island. He dances back and forth with his spear facing upwards. The spear hurts but can be spinjumped from above, and the Shy Guy can be killed with a precise jump.

name: ...dances in place
desc: A Spear Guy from Yoshi's Island. He dances in place with his spear facing upwards. The spear hurts but can be spinjumped from above, and the Shy Guy can be killed with a precise jump.

name: Woozy Guy (dynamic)
desc: A Woozy Guy from Yoshi's Island. He does somersaults towards Mario. Its color is based on its starting X position.
